Message: - Angel uses Celestial Torrent! Reaper takes 168 damage.
- Orc uses Shadow Dance! Zombie takes 80 damage.
- Minotaur uses Blazing Valor! Golem takes 70 damage.
- Zombie uses Blazing Valor! Deals 30 damage.
Special ability is on cooldown for 2 rounds.
- Golem defends! Golem's defense increases by 28 for 2 rounds.
